about_the_game:
Prohibition is over, but the world of organized crime continues to thrive. New York City is controlled by five powerful mafia families, in a fierce struggle for power. In this scenario of intrigue and power, your cunning and determination will be tested as never before.

Manage your Family and build an empire
Take on the role of Don and build your own criminal empire. Manage your family’s resources and affiliates; plan every move, from petty crimes to large-scale operations and earn respect through a combination of diplomacy and violence.

Extortion, robbery or burning of business
Use ruthless methods to raise funds and expand your influence. Extort money from local merchants, rob your rivals or burn their property to show your power and intimidate those who dare to oppose.

Wage war on other families and kill their mademan
Declare war on rival families and eliminate their mademan: plan strategic attacks, assassinations and ambushes to weaken them. Defend your territory and consolidate your power. Violence is inevitable in your ascent; only the most smart and determined will succeed.

Drug trafficking
Infiltrate the lucrative drug market and increase your income. Secure safe supplies, distribute goods to maximize profits and avoid the attention of law enforcement.

Control the Commission
Become the head of the Commission and use your power to influence decisions that govern the criminal world. Negotiate with the other mafia families and make important decisions. Your leadership will be crucial to maintain order among the mafia families and establish your dominance over all criminal activities in the city.

Be Ready for Arrests and Investigations
The law is always on our tail. Protect your organization from arrest and investigation, bribe the police and use informants to stay one step ahead of law enforcement. And "manage" the “infamy” problem.

Launder dirty money
A dirty dollar is worth less than a clean one. Launder your illicit earnings by investing in legitimate assets to avoid suspicion and maintain a constant cash flow. Clean money is the most useful during difficult times.

Wiseguys: The Commission combines deep management strategy with intense action, giving you deep strategic experience in the dark world of the Italian mafia in a charming 2D style. Are you ready to be the next boss of all bosses?

short_description: Take the role of Don in "Wiseguys: The Commission" and dominate New York. Plan crimes, traffic drugs, extort money and make war on rival families. Control the Commission, launder money. Your cunning will decide your fate. Are you ready to become the next boss of all bosses?
